mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID as memberId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT HOSPITAL_ID) as hospitalBookmarks, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT PHARMACY_ID) as pharmacyBookmarks FROM BOOKMARK WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY MEMBER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK (MEMBER_ID, HOSPITAL_ID) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{hospitalId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE HOSPITAL_ID = VALUES(HOSPITAL_ID)
INSERT INTO BOOKMARK (MEMBER_ID, PHARMACY_ID) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{pharmacyId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PHARMACY_ID = VALUES(PHARMACY_ID)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOOKMARK WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId}
DELETE FROM BOOKMARK WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PHARMACY_ID = #{pharmacyId}
